ksql: CREATE STREAM "CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw_stream" (charge VARCHAR) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw', VALUE_FORMAT='DELIMITED');CREATE STREAM "CIQ000000017_out_charge" WITH (VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO') AS SELECT CHARGE AS CHARGE, SUBSTRING(ROWKEY,1,LEN(ROWKEY)-11) AS CLIENT_ID, ROWTIME AS TIMESTAMP FROM "CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw_stream";
